title: Mouse and keyboard are fine out of game, in game they are laggy AF

replies.body:
Can you give me a bit more detail as to how they're "laggy af", fam?

With a bit more context, I can give you a better solution. ^.^

The mouse doesn't operate smoothly and the keyboard acts like it is not connected and then all actions I've been trying to hit spam at once in directions I wasn't aiming at. The rest of the game is playingsmoothly.

Sorry for the delay, I was out for PAX.

So this happens in intervals? I suspect this may be bursts of packet loss, as the packets that hold your actions are being delayed or lost on their way to the server, then they suddenly catch up. Sometimes this can be caused by problems in your route, but more often than not, local network settings are the culprit. Because of this, I recommend starting with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your network configuration is up to spec.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I'm not seeing any part of the guide you linked that says 'fix your network settings'
